Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Chemnitz, ACHAT Comfort Messe-Chemnitz is convenient to Chemnitz Arena and Villa Esche. This hotel is within close proximity of Chemnitz Museum of Industry and Chemnitz Museum of Natural History.

Rooms
Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 99 guestrooms, featuring fireplaces and LCD televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of ACHAT Comfort Messe-Chemnitz, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in Chemnitz? This hotel features 925 square feet (86 square meters) of event facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.
